string-array.name: first_guide_contents
string-array.item: You can use text, images, and voice recordings in your notes. A rich library of styles and fonts will make your simple scribbles look stunning.
Checklists and reminders come to help when you need basic and effective tools for planning your next trip or putting together a grocery list.
You can generate scrolling screenshots in Notes automatically, and them share them with your friends.
Press the arrow below to create a new folder or switch between existing ones.

string-array.name: second_guide_contents
string-array.item: Create notes using our built-in speech-to-text engine attaching the original recordings of your voice to the notes.
